fr.sorbonne_u.cps.smartcity.components

Class FireStationFacade

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.sorbonne_u.components.AbstractComponent
      • fr.sorbonne_u.cps.smartcity.components.FireStationFacade
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    fr.sorbonne_u.components.ComponentI, FireStationNotificationImplI

    public class FireStationFacade
extends fr.sorbonne_u.components.AbstractComponent
implements FireStationNotificationImplI
    The class FireStationFacade implements a component that can inspire the programming of events emitter and action executors components in the CEP system applied to the smart city application.

    Description

    Invariant

     invariant              true

    Created on : 2022-01-27

    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant

      • FireStationFacade

        protected FireStationFacade(java.lang.String stationId,
                            java.lang.String notificationInboundPortURI,
                            java.lang.String actionInboundPortURI)
                     throws java.lang.Exception
        create a fire station facade component.

        Contract

         pre     BasicSimSmartCityDescriptor.isValidFireStationId(stationId)
 pre     notificationInboundPortURI != null && !notificationInboundPortURI.isEmpty()
 pre     actionInboundPortURI != null && !actionInboundPortURI.isEmpty()
 post   true            // no postcondition.
        Parameters:
        stationId - identifier of the corresponding fire station.
        notificationInboundPortURI - URI of the notification inbound port to be used by this facade component.
        actionInboundPortURI - URI of the action inbound port of the proxy component.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - to do.
